sentences: Ta õppis kõnni lugeda enne kui ta saab teha eksami.
See raamat selgitab hästi kõnni ja kirja vahet.
translation: reading (in the context of learning to read)
context: 'kõnni' primarily refers to speech or spoken language. In educational contexts, especially for children, it can also refer to reading aloud or the act of reading. It is commonly used in phrases related to speaking and literacy development.
